appSubtitle: Quickly shape slide styles and themes to craft clear, structured slide prompts.
contentPlaceholder: Paste topic notes, context, and key points...
resultReadyHint: Preview is ready. Copy or export the generated prompt.
resultEmptyHint: Enter source content to generate a live prompt preview.
emptyPrompt: No prompt yet. Fill in controls and content to generate output.

style-default-1.name: Executive Insight
style-default-1.promptHint: Sharp business framing with concise decisions and outcomes.

style-default-2.name: Story Arc
style-default-2.promptHint: Narrative-first flow with a hook, tension, and payoff.

style-default-5.name: Teaching Deck
style-default-5.promptHint: Explain concepts progressively with recap moments.

style-default-6.name: Workshop Guide
style-default-6.promptHint: Interactive format with exercises and checkpoints.

style-default-7.name: Board Update
style-default-7.promptHint: Top-level strategic summary with risks and next actions.

style-default-8.name: Sales Enablement
style-default-8.promptHint: Value proposition, objections, and conversion-oriented framing.

style-default-9.name: Investor Narrative
style-default-9.promptHint: Traction metrics, growth logic, and funding rationale.

style-default-10.name: Product Walkthrough
style-default-10.promptHint: Feature-benefit storyline with visual demonstration cues.

style-default-11.name: Research Report
style-default-11.promptHint: Hypothesis, method, findings, and implications sequence.

style-default-12.name: Roadmap Sync
style-default-12.promptHint: Timeline-driven structure with dependencies and milestones.

style-default-14.name: Training Sprint
style-default-14.promptHint: Fast practical learning path with short retention prompts.

style-default-15.name: Design Review
style-default-15.promptHint: Design intent, trade-offs, alternatives, and final direction.

style-default-17.name: Change Proposal
style-default-17.promptHint: Current pain, proposed shift, expected gains, rollout plan.

style-default-18.name: Technical Deep Dive
style-default-18.promptHint: Architecture-focused sequence with clear abstraction layers.

style-default-19.name: Quarterly Recap
style-default-19.promptHint: Wins, misses, learnings, and upcoming focus.

style-default-20.name: Customer Journey
style-default-20.promptHint: Map stages, friction points, and value moments.
